text: On goh a'zoi sakli uro rost kard va purra gardonid va ofarinisi uro ʙisjor zeʙo va neku namud va az Ruhi Xud ʙa vositai maloika dar on ʙidamid. Va ʙarojaton gusu casmho soxt, to ʙajni ovozu ranghoro cudo kuned va dilho ofarid, to ʙa aqli xes ʙajni neku ʙad va foidavu zararro dark namoed. Ci andak sumo sukr megued
